programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Muddy Puddles - It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Big Bad Hen - Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Boots / Moon Parrot / Tailball - Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. // Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. // Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S08 Ep801
programme.desc: The Pirate Grand Prix - It'sPegwheel the pirate'sfirst race-and who better to join him than Pirate Blaze! Can they beat Crusher to the trophy and prove they're the best racers on the seven seas?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Bedtime / Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg - The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out! // Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest.

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Ratoncito Perez / The Berry Hungry Caterpillar - Dora helps Ratoncito Perez fix his magic toothbrush wand so she can get a gift for her missing tooth. // Dora meets Carlos, a giant caterpillar who wants to be a butterfly!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Best Friend - Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Polly Parrot - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Peppa and George decide to play a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Playgroup - Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Mummy Pig at Work - Peppa accidentally crashes Mummy Pig's computer, so Daddy Pig tries to fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Piggy in the Middle - Peppa teaches George how to catch a ball, and later, they play Monkey in the Middle with Mummy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Daddy Loses his Glasses - Daddy Pig is a little upset because he lost his glasses, so Peppa and George try to find them.

programme.desc: Fly Spy - The friends come together to plan a secret surprise for Fly. However, as Hooper and Fly find out there's a big secret, they try to use their super-spy plan to discover what the surprise is.

programme.desc: Sneezy Wheezy - Everyone in OKIDO has been kept awake by a mysterious sound. Messy and his friends go to find its source and discover that the giants need their help.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Curry Quest - Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep5
programme.desc: I'm Hungry - King Tiger and the Jelly wonder what Duggee has planned for today. Tag wants a snack, Enid has a musical cheese chase, and Norrie has a haircut.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jetter or No Jetter? - Foz starts to think his team doesn't need him anymore. Can Tala convince him he still has what it takes to be a Go Jetter, or will he follow Glitch down a different path?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hospital - Doctor Bluey is needed when Dad gets a very curious x-ray from Nurse Bingo. It seems he has a cat in his tummy!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Squash - When dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings don't always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Andy and the Grizzly Bear Cubs - In this episode Andy, Jen & Scout head to Alaska, in America, on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of fish being buried underground. Along the way, Andy meets a grizzly bear cub setting out on its first fishing trip with its mother to catch salmon.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Mission: Talent Show - Therapy dog Toffee and his owner Helen help Betty and Pop-Pop feel brave enough to perform at their talent show at the Woofton Care Home.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Aye Aye and Prevost's Squirrel - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet an aye aye. They see how this night-loving lemur has one extraordinarily long finger, that it uses to tap on tree branches to find hollows full of bugs. Next Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet some Prevost's squirrels.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Gem - In this episode, Captain Captain challenges Gem to swap places so Gem can see just how hard it is to be Captain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels are off for a Jamboree to make some new friends, play games and have a picnic. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping and they hear a scary noise outside the tent!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The Squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the Squirrels don't quite understand, so they ask all the other animals for advice. Does anyone have the answer?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep10
programme.desc: Thomas Makes a Mistake - After Thomas makes a mistake with an important silk delivery in India, he causes chaos and confusion by not seeking help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Bubble Bumbling - The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Toggle Tangle - After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Circus - The circus bus has broken down, but the children are waiting for a circus show! Can Stanley help out?

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Stuck - Stanley has to free Myrtle, who is stuck, using his new tunnelling mole machine so she can attend the schools tree planting day.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep75
programme.desc: Get It Wrong To Get It Right - Monty is sad when he messes up his paper plane creation, but Gran teaches him that a person can learn from their mistakes.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep24
programme.desc: It's Time to Make a Family Tree - Great-Gran Gran shows JoJo an old family photo - it's fun spotting Gran Gran, Mummy and Great-Gran Gran when they were younger. JoJo recognises some people, but there are lots of members of her family that she's never met before.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Stories - Indy thinks she's no good because her model horse looks like a cow, but Calypso encourages her not to give up, so she tries to fix it with a little help from Winton.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Turtle Boy - Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep21
programme.desc: The Collecting Badge - Duggee is cleaning his biscuit tin collection, one of the many things he collects. The squirrels are inspired to make their own collections.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels have arrived and they're all a little bit hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Stick Time - How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Go Jetter or No Jetter? - Foz starts to think his team doesn't need him anymore. Can Tala convince him he still has what it takes to be a Go Jetter, or will he follow Glitch down a different path?

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Asparagus - Asparagus shares his deep affection for wet weather in the song "I Love The Rain".

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Garlic - Fitness guru, Garlic, has a set of fun exercises to make you stronger.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Great Book Rescue - Evil Pea takes all the books from the Supermarket. Supertato, Chilli and Carrot try to rescue all the books by using acrobatic skills they learnt from their favourite circus book.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Hiccup Havoc - Supertato gets hiccups while Evil Pea is firing jam at Tato Tower. Supertato harnesses the power of his hiccups to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's jam attack.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep64
programme.desc: Picnic - The Teletubbies go on a very special picnic together. Lots of Tubby Toast pops out of the Dup Dup and lands on the picnic plates for the Teletubbies to munch.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Pizza - Dee encourages a friend to say 'pizza' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of pizza - a round pizza, a tomato pizza, a party pizza and a cheesy pizza!

Is this the German comeback weve been waiting for or just another blip?

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 GOALS - LIGUE 1 TOP 10 GOALS
programme.desc: Power, precision, perfection. Ligue 1s top 10 goals of 22/23 were of the highest order.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC313PereiravsAnkalaev
programme.desc: After a historic 2024 that saw him defend his UFC light heavyweight title three times with three knockouts, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC315MuhammadvsDellaMaddalena
programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena, and Manon Fiorot battles to be the first female French champion against Flyweight phenom Valentina Shevchenko. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1101Bestof2023
programme.desc: 2024 - UFC Ultimate Knockouts showcases the most thrilling KOs from recent UFC events in 2023 and 2024. Relive the explosive highlights from fighters like Max Holloway, Islam Makhachev, and Alex Pereira.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC312DuPlessisvsStrickland2
programme.desc: UFC 312 Countdown previews the promotions return to Sydney, where Dricus Du Plessis looks to defend his middleweight title against Sean Strickland in a rematch. Plus, strawweight champion Zhang Weili collides with wrestling phenom Tatiana Suarez.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs. Reyes
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFCs return to Perth on September 28 will feature one of the most explosive members of the Anzac contingent, as New Zealands top light heavyweight contender, Carlos Ulberg attempts to make his case for a world title shot when he faces American standout Dominick Reyes. Winner of eight in a row with five finishes, Ulberg is peaking at the right time after back-to-back wins over Volkan Oezdemir and Jan Blachowicz, and now he has his sights set on ending the winning streak of Reyes, who has knocked out his last three opponents en route to this showdown at RAC Arena

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Ulberg vs. Reyes
programme.desc: Main Event - The UFCs return to Perth on September 28 will feature one of the most explosive members of the Anzac contingent, as New Zealands top light heavyweight contender, Carlos Ulberg attempts to make his case for a world title shot when he faces American standout Dominick Reyes. Winner of eight in a row with five finishes, Ulberg is peaking at the right time after back-to-back wins over Volkan Oezdemir and Jan Blachowicz, and now he has his sights set on ending the winning streak of Reyes, who has knocked out his last three opponents en route to this showdown at RAC Arena

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: Noche UFC: Lopes vs. Silva
programme.desc: Prelims - The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep803
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Randy Brown, Locked In: Ailin Perez, Fighting For Change: Ode Osbourne - Randy Brown unveils the hardships of his turbulent upbringing in Spanish Town, Jamaica, and his remarkable rise to the pinnacle of MMA. Argentinian Ailin Perez opens up about her fierce drive for competition in the UFC Womens Bantamweight Division. Ode Osbourne participates in a youth mentorship program, where he delivers an impactful message to the SASA Squad Foundation.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC297
programme.desc: Strickland vs Du Plessis - For the first time ever, Sphere Las Vegas hosts the UFC, as devastating striker Suga Sean OMalley defends his UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.desc: When the Octagon returns to Montreal for the first time since 2015, fans are treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. Plus, the return of Jose Aldo and much more on UFC Reloaded.
